original: Joachimson, Carl Erik Gustaf, major, Karlskrona, f. 31/5/89 i Sundsvall av dir. Oscar Bernhard T. o. Wendla Stadin. G. 28 m. Ebba Äbra-hamsson. Barn: Maud f. 32. — Stud:-ex. i Sundsvall 08, off:ex. 11, KSHS, SS. Und:löjtn. v. kustart. 11, löjtnant 16, kapten 24, major i marinen 40. RSO.
translated: Joachimson, Carl Erik Gustaf, major, Karlskrona, born on May 31, 1889 in Sundsvall, son of director Oscar Bernhard T. and Wendla Stadin. Married on 28 in marriage with Ebba Äbra-hamsson. Children: Maud, born in 1932. Completed student examination in Sundsvall in 1908, officer examination in 1911, at KSHS, SS. Sub-lieutenant in the coastal artillery in 1911, lieutenant in 1916, captain in 1924, major in the navy in 1940. Awarded the Royal Order of the Sword.
